mapper.select:
SELECT t.uid, t.id, t.document_number, t.apply_date, t.apply_name, t.city_firm, t.case_name, t.dispute_resolution, t.supreme_court_cause, t.case_reason, t.amount_involved, t.other_case_reason, t.major_degree, t.organizer, t.litigation_goal, t.litigation_goal_deviation_rate, t.reasons_for_arbitration, t.focus_of_case, t.please_indicate, t.legal_opinion, t.approval_status, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.statistics_city_name, t.alert_node
,op1.operation_name,op1.by_operation_people_id
FROM
t_oa_law_casefilingapproval t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{param.ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_law_casefilingapproval t on op.uid=t.uid
t.id =#{param.id}
and t.document_number LIKE concat('%',#{param.documentNumber},'%')
and t.city_firm LIKE concat('%',#{param.cityFirm},'%')
and t.apply_date LIKE concat('%',#{param.applyDate},'%')
and t.statistics_city_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.statisticsCityName},'%')
and t.organizer LIKE concat('%',#{param.organizer},'%')
and t.supreme_court_cause LIKE concat('%',#{param.supremeCourtCause},'%')
and t.alert_node =#{param.alertNode}
and t.has_read =#{param.hasRead}
and t.monitor_status =#{param.monitorStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(t.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t.approval_status = #{param.approvalStatus}
order by t.update_time desc

select count(*) total, count(case when has_read = 'beread' then 1 end) beread, count(case when monitor_status = 'special_attention' then 1 end) specialAttention, count(case when monitor_status = 'warning' then 1 end) warning, count(case when monitor_status = 'normal' then 1 end) normal from ( SELECT t.id, t.document_number, t.apply_date, t.city_firm, t.organizer, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.alert_node FROM
t_oa_law_casefilingapproval t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{countParam.ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_law_casefilingapproval t on op.uid=t.uid
) oa
oa.id =#{countParam.id}
and oa.document_number LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.documentNumber},'%')
and oa.city_firm LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.cityFirm},'%')
and oa.apply_date LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.applyDate},'%')
and t.organizer LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.organizer},'%')
and t.supreme_court_cause LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.supremeCourtCause},'%')

select statistics_city_name, count(*) total from t_oa_law_casefilingapproval where statistics_city_name is not null AND statistics_city_name != ''
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY statistics_city_name
